gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Global L3C AVHRR Sea Surface Temperature (GHRSST) - Metop

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Other access: Metop-B based re-distribution by PODACC (2016-Jan-06 to Present)

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Global Metop/AVHRR sub-skin Sea Surface Temperature (GBL SST) is a 12 hourly synthesis on a 0.05° global grid. The product format is compliant with the Data Specification (GDS) version 2 from the Group for High Resolution Sea Surface Temperatures (GHRSST). This product can be downloaded as numerical data in EUMETView NG, where it is provided through a Web Coverage Service (WCS).
